artist.name: Marcus Sterling
artist.description: Marcus Sterling is someone with a laid back personality and always likes to make sure everyone is having a good time. His music is a reflection of his personality but also some of his emotions.

artist.name: C.R.
artist.description: C.R. is a guy who is known for being someone who has good vibes and likes to make music that speaks about his loyalty for friends and family.

artist.name: WTN E
artist.description: Indianapolis, WTN E is a high energy guy. His music also reflects his personality as he makes a lot of music that can get you hyped up.

artist.name: 317 Boys
artist.description: 317 Boys are upcoming rappers coming straight out their room, literally.
